text: This is a list of heads of state of Chad since the country gained independence from France in 1960 to the present day. ==List of officeholders== Portrait Name Elected Term of office Political party Prime minister(s) Took office Left office Time in office 1 François Tombalbaye 1962 1969 1960 1975 Position not established – Noël Milarew Odingar — 1975 1975 Military Position not established 2 Félix Malloum — 1975 1979 Military Habré 3 Goukouni Oueddei — 1979 1979 Position vacant 4 Lol Mahamat Choua — 1979 1979 MPLT Position vacant Goukouni Oueddei — 1979 1982 Ngardoum 5 Hissène Habré 1989 1982 1990 Ngardoum 6 Idriss Déby 1996 2001 2006 2011 2016 2021 1990 2021 Military / Patriotic Salvation Movement Bawoyeu Yodoyman Moungar Koumakoye Djimasta Ouaido Yamassoum Kabadi Faki Yoadimnadji Younousmi Koumakoye Abbas Nadingar Dadnadji Deubet Padacké 7 Mahamat Déby — 10 October 2022 (Acting: 20 April 2021 – 10 October 2022) Incumbent Military / Patriotic Salvation Movement Padacké Kebzabo ==Other websites== * Presidency of Chad * World Statesmen – Chad *
title: List of heads of state of Chad
